document.full_text: the widow of ephraim g. karpel says that being pressed by the f.b.i. to record conversations about wall street trading drove her husband to despair.
document.title: a trader, an f.b.i. witness, and then a suicide
lines_and_colors: the widow of ephraim g. karpel says that being pressed by the f.b.i. to record conversations about wall street trading drove her husband to despair.
